paper_abstract: Purpose - The purpose of this paper is to provide a mixture model with modified mass transfer expression for calculating cavitating (two-phase) flow. Design/methodology/approach - The mass transfer relations are derived based on the mechanics of evaporation and condensation, in which the mass and momentum transfer count for factors such as non-dissolved gas, turbulence, surface tension, phase-change rate, etc. Findings - As shown by two calculation examples, the modified model can predict the cavitating flow with high accuracy, agreeing well with experimental results. Originality/value - The methods described are of value in improving stability in numerical calculations.
paper_title: A mixture model with modified mass transfer expression for cavitating turbulent flow simulation
